golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Scheuermann's kyphoscoliosis
2. adolescent idiopathic kyphoscoliosis
3. rheumatoid arthritis
4. juvenile rheumatoid arthritis
5. ankylosing spondylitis
6. inflammatory bowel disease-related kyphoscoliosis
7. neuromuscular scoliosis
8. congenital kyphoscoliosis
9. fibromyalgia-related kyphoscoliosis
10. rare genetic disorders causing kyphoscoliosis (e.g., mutations in the COL1A1 or TGFB1 genes)
